original_text: And all the acts of his power and of his might, and the declaration of the greatness of Mordecai, whereunto the king advanced him, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Media and Persia?
korean_text: 왕의 능력 있는 모든 행적과 모르드개를 높여 존귀하게 한 사적이 메대와 바사 왕들의 일기에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: And all the acts of his power
and declaration of greatness of Mordecai
are they not written in book of chronicles
of kings of Media and Persia?
